column.heading: Lead Engineer (Remote)
list: Developed the frontend for an A/B testing and analytics dashboard for Shopify store owners using Vue3, Pinia, Apollo, Tailwind, and Vite.
Setup automatic deployment processes for all of our projects using Github Actions and AWS.
Worked extensively on our backend services using Node, Mongo, Apollo, and GraphQL to add functionality.
Worked on bringing previously unfinished projects using Vue2, Node, and MongoDB across the finish line.
Developed previously unfinished Shopify extensions across the finish line.
Developed multiple landing pages for previously unfinished projects and products in Vue3.
Developed the frontend for a shipping protection dashboard targeted at Shopify store owners.
Configured a large portion of AWS to run our applications. Including Elastic beanstalk, Serverless Functions with Lambda, S3, Cognito, API Gateway, etc

column.heading: Lead Frontend Engineer (Remote)
list: Developed multiple internal dashboards in both Vue2 and Vue3 for a variety of automated dropshipping products.
Developed realtime events services (backend) that integrated into our existing backend and wrote frontend features to display those realtime events.
Modernized and ported old Vue2 dashboards to Vue3.
Designed strategies to incrementally adopt Vue3 while maintaining the existing Vue2 project.
Developed custom integrations for payment methods using Walmart and Stripe APIs.
Created robust impersonation features for product admins to act on behalf of individual users to offer technical support.

column.heading: Senior Software Developer
list: Designed unique aesthetic mobile-first web apps.
Implemented a variety of responsive web apps from the ground up for aggregating and leasing/financing semi-trucks, semi-trailers, and heavy machinery.
Worked on Node.js microservices to automate data uploads of hundreds of thousands of site listings and images daily from each client's unique data structures.
Heavily optimized web apps for SEO, mobile devices, and slow 3g connections, using micro-frameworks and a custom static rendering solution.
Designed and implemented inventory management and leasing/financing dashboards for large semi-truck and heavy machinery dealerships and lessors.
Worked with many frameworks and platforms like Vue.js, Hyperapp, Angular, Node.js, Express, Koa, Micro, Netlify, Heroku, AWS, and MongoDB.
Managed targeted social media marketing campaigns across popular platforms.
Implemented fine-grained conversion tracking with Google Analytics event system.
Implemented an email notification system using Sparkpost.

Designed and developed original websites, business cards, logos, infographics, and other printed and digital documents.
Added features, tweaked designs, and updated content on existing apps.
